name: Ludwig's Pot-Rig
description: Ludwig in a magic flying pot of gold and dodge purple pterodactyls! This is my first official game from scratch and it took me 1 day to make. I made this game as a meme for my friend (without him knowing) since we have a little inside joke where my friends and I call him Ludwig. Sorry if you're reading this Sean LOL. I apologize if you notice any bugs.
